mapper.select: select * from stock_market.HaveStock where memberId=#{memberId} and stockCode=#{stockCode}
select * from stock_market.HaveStockView where memberId=#{memberId} and stockCode=#{stockCode}
mapper.update: update stock_market.HaveStock set quantity=#{quantity}, sum=#{sum} where memberId=#{memberId} and stockCode=#{stockCode}
mapper.insert: insert into stock_market.HaveStock(memberId, stockCode, quantity, sum) values(#{memberId},#{stockCode},#{quantity},#{sum})
mapper.delete: delete from stock_market.HaveStock where memberId=#{memberId} and stockCode=#{stockCode}
